item.description:
**** The Amherst Cinema shows TTSS playing 1/14 on two screens, with screentimes of 4:00 and 4:25. I picked 4:00 because at least one of our members is going to the Salsa meetup afterwards. I hope this works for everyone else.

The review link is from the NYT.  I added a link to the "expert guide will both deepen the film and provide the ultimate cheat sheet" from Salon.com. ****

From the IMDB;

"In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet agent within MI6's echelons."

From Salon.com;

http://www.salon.com/2011/12/19/everything_...

The latest review from the NYT is at;

http://movies.nytimes.com/2011/12/09/movies...
item.how_to_find_us: Near the entrance in front of the restrooms, the meetup time is for 15 minutes before the screentime, I'll get there one half hour before the movie starts. Red/brown/black jacket? ... not sure yet..
item.name: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier Spy - Saturday, 1/14, 3:45
